content.html: Absolutely cannot believe that I spent this much time and money making my Good TV look like my Bad TV. (This uses a hardware-accelerated, 14-pass video shader, rendered at 4Kp60 resolution.)
content.value:
Absolutely cannot believe that I spent this much time and money making my Good TV look like my Bad TV.

(This uses a hardware-accelerated, 14-pass video shader, rendered at 4Kp60 resolution.)
